net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets

Class PopupMouseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.handler.AbstractMouseDragHandler
      • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.PopupMouseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseDownHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseMoveHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseUpHandler, com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, com.google.gwt.user.client.Event.NativePreviewHandler, AbstractCustomHandler

    class PopupMouseHandler
extends AbstractMouseDragHandler
    This class is the handler for mouse events to move an resize a PopupWindow.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      The current Rectangle of the PopupWindow.
      private PopupWindow popupWindow
      The PopupWindow to manage.
      private Direction resizeDirection
      The resize Direction or null for move.

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        protected boolean isActive()
        This method can be overridden for dynamic activation of this handler.
        Overrides:
        isActive in class AbstractMouseDragHandler
        Returns:
        true if this handler is active, false if it is inactive (ignores all events and does nothing).

      • onMouseMove

        protected void onMouseMove(int deltaX,
                           int deltaY,
                           com.google.gwt.dom.client.NativeEvent nativeEvent)
        Specified by:
        onMouseMove in class AbstractMouseDragHandler
        Parameters:
        deltaX - is the relative movement of the mouse position on X-axis.
        deltaY - is the relative movement of the mouse position on Y-axis.
        nativeEvent - is the NativeEvent that triggered this invocation.
